biotools.summary: INTER-Species Protein Interaction Analysis. Given a set of proteins of user's interest, it first discovers additional proteins that are functionally associated with the input proteins and searches for different patterns of PPIs in multiple species through a server-side pipeline, and second visualizes the dynamics of PPIs in multiple species using an easy-to-use web interface.

bioschemas.name: INTERSPIA
